Text: Thanks for all of your uploads mate. Am I the only one or when I install this and register it, after a few minutes use it shuts down saying it is unlicensed?

Yeah, I am having the same problem with Yojimbo shutting down after a few minutes, with a message that the software "appears to be unlicensed" popping up. I assume that Yojimbo is phoning home and they have the SN blacklisted, or something along those lines.
Use Little Snitch to block it from calling home!
